title: I think im Demi-sexual or Asexual
body:
im not sexually attracted to any gender or group, I am 16 and i dont have any 'urges'. I'd rather play League than have sexual intercourse but this could be because i haven't fully hit puberty yet?

Has this happened to anyone?
Can i hit puberty later on in life?

replies.body: Thanks for the replies, I do hang out with friends at school because I cant play games there and i do have a social life. I tried watching porn but its quite boring and weird. But can puberty be delayed or at least fixed?
How popular are you? try spending more time with girls, it might change the way you feel.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=nK0tANrb,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-08T10:10:06.700+0000)
>
> How popular are you? try spending more time with girls, it might change the way you feel.

Why girls, Guys are good aswell
Your choice

Not sure why you are posting this on the League forums...
But as an asexual myself, I don't think you should worry about this so much. So what if you're asexual? No time needed out of your day to jerk off, ey? :P If you're worried about how this can effect dating too... I've been in sexual relationships. Just because you're not sexually attracted to someone, doesn't mean sex is impossible. Like, I've had sex with someone and it was satisfying to see that person take pleasure. 
Give it some thought though. Sexuality is weird, and, who knows, it might pick up for you one day. I never used to be interested in League, and now I am, so umm... maybe the same thing can happen with sex? :P

There's no rush. Don't feel forced into anything, you might just not be sexually attracted to anyone and that's okay. You are normal. :) Just continue to do the things you like and see where life takes you.

Opinion. Vidja Games have ruined/setback a lot of people in terms of physical face2face social activities. This may result in being less interested in seeking relationships in general. Or a lack of commitment to other people.

I wouldnt be surprised that there would be a negative correlation between games played (Hours) vs Time being outwardly social in terms of physical contact (Hours). I Can attest to that. Although my opinion sees me making attempts at going out and being physically social rather than staying purely/majoritivly virtually social.

Very unlikely that you have not hit puberty by 16. There are some cases in which people have late or never do have an onset of hormones so its not completely out of the question. I would probably say that due to sedation(Sitting at computer a lot. Not going out to socialise. Lack of exercise) and less social interaction with the opposite sex, that hormones (particularly Testosterone, if you are a male im assuming) are not being produced at 'normal' rates. By normal i mean rates at which there is distinct desire to reproduce and to outwardly seek a mate ( in its purest sense). Due to no constant or very irregular social interaction with the opposite sex, testosterone levels probably drop. Do you find yourself with no intention of being in a relationship or just very little intention? 

Pretty sure no such thing as Demi-sexual... Seems just like another tag to categorise someone on the scale. I mean Demi in itself describes something as half or less and in an inferior sense than normal. You are either sexual (from hetero to homo) or asexual. I dont think you can be halfassedsexual.

As for sexual activity, youll be ready when you're ready. Those people that talk up how hot girls are as a social thing may just have a higher level of hormones that effects their thinking. When guys talk about breast and what not, its actually a very primal instinctive feeling. (most of us) would have been raised by a mother figure and most likely have been breast fed. As a infant we would have sought comfort or protection to a mothers breasts as its an integral life giving 'essence'. It only seems logical that we strive to return to what we know is good for us. Yay Titties!

also if bait 7/10. Cant give you more than that because i already have assumed it could be bait :(

I don't understand what those words mean but I myself can't see the point in sexual intercourse with any random person, I just don't feel like I would have sex with anyone unless I found someone I really loved but even then I probably wouldn't care too much about that side of the relationship. Back to your topic as said here if your a complete and utter shut in maybe it's just that you haven't ever had the opportunity to have those urges in the first place.

Everyone else talks about how hot this chick is or who has huge breasts and dating. Buts srs who would spend so much money on someone, imagine the amount of rp you could buy. Also im not that good at League, i just started playing a few months ago...

....so you can reproduce by your self?

demisexual could be it, and you havnt had a connection with anyone yet.

mostly i would say its just games are more important to you atm. so make it worthwhile, get into the challenger series and go pro. and always remember, chicks dig elo.

does your computer have a floppy %%%% drive? have you tried putting your %%%% into it? you might be pcsexual if all you want to do is play league.

also how do you not fully hit puberty. you're either going through puberty or you're not lmao.
